mapper.insert: insert into userfile(UID, fileName, fileType, fileSize, fileState, fileDir) values (#{UID}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{fileState}, #{fileDir});
mapper.select: select * from UserFile where fileState = 'N' and deleteTime < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL #{days} day);
mapper.delete: delete from UserFile where fileState = 'N' and deleteTime < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL #{days} day);
